name: Gardeners Grove
description:
Currently In Alpha

Gardeners Grove is a singleplayer experience in which players can use the overgrown nature around them to create and customise their very own garden space. Relax as you collect and breed a vast variety of plants to fill your garden with, and watch as your garden begins to attract some interesting creatures. Gift and trade plants with friends to expand your collection.

The concept closely resembles the creation of an allotment in which people often take an un-used overgrown space and revitalise it to grow and harvest plants. Allotment owners often share plants and agricultural produce with one another in order to help each other grow more. There is a great sense of community and self-achievement associated with allotment creation and Gardeners Grove aims to reflect that.

2.0 playtest survey can be completed here: https://forms.gle/KXeckSYz15bRa96G6
